      public void deleteTeam​(java.lang.Long id) throws ValidatorException
      Deletes the team with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - must be positive
      Throws:
      ValidatorException - if the given id is not associated with any existing team, ValidatorException is throwed

    • filterByTeamName

      public java.util.Set<Team> filterByTeamName​(java.lang.String token)
      Returns all teams that contain in their team name the given token
      Parameters:
      token - A substring of the team names
      Returns:
      All teams containing the token as substring of their team names
